# ✅ isHex

Simple Python package to check if string is valid hexadecimal.  

## 🚀 Usage

_Coming soon!_  

## 📦 Installation

_Coming soon!_  

## 👨‍💻 Developing isHex

To install isHex, along with the tools you will need to develop and run tests, run the following in your virtualenv:  

```bash
$ pip install -e .[dev]
```
